resources.string:
Oh, khudaya, hosh mera kaise tu udaaye?
Oh, khudaya, zikr tera hothon pe kyun aaye?

Oh, khudaya, haal mera mujhko tu batlaaye
Oh, khudaya, tez hava tera naam le jaaye

Oh, sajna
Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, sajna ve, oh

Hai kya pata, pata kya dil
Bole-sunaaye jo teri kahaaniyan

Aankhein kabhi chhupati hain
Kabhi dikhaati hain teri nishaaniyan

Koi baat aisi hai nahi, jismein baat teri ho nahi
Tere khwaab leke jaage hain arson baad, ho

Oh, khudaya, mann ye mera aisey kyun muskaaye?
Oh, khudaya, aks tera mujhko hai chhoo jaaye

Oh, sajna
Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, sajna ve

Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, sajna ve
Oh, sajna ve, sajna ve

Oh, sajna ve, oh, sajna ve (sajna ve)
 
Writer(s): VISHAL MISHRA, AKSHAY TRIPATHI
